title: Fix the New Client
body:
I'm really sick of this new client glitching every time I try to play a game. I've summited bug reports and a ticket but no one seems to care.
* I've been leave-busted 3 times now because the client decides it wants to repair every single file in the game when I try to enter the loading screen. It's very irritating I'm losing LP and probably affecting my honor score it's not fair and needs to be fixed because I'm 100% positive I'm not the only one experiencing that crap, I love this game but I don't want to play anymore...

replies.body: Yeah, I really enjoy the help I'm not getting thanks for making this gaming experience amazing.

If your client is needing to repair that often, you may want to take a step back to figure out just what exactly is going wrong. Regardless of whether you intentionally leave or your game crashes, all of that time spent without a 5th teammate is going to affect the other peoples games. Look at those leaverbusters as a cry for help, and we definitely need to fix your client before entering into any more games.

I'd suggest running a quick repair through the client options to make sure everything is in order first. Test it in a custom or practice match, and if the game crashes again then I'd recommend moving on to using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and doing a **reinstall and clean uninstall**.
